name: Dino Life . Jurassic Dinosaur Hopper Simulator Games For Free
name_original: Dino Life . Jurassic Dinosaur Hopper Simulator Games For Free
description:
The dinosaurs are back! They are seizing the jungle, but the other animals don't want that to happen!

CRAZY RACES
Choose your favourite dino between the different available dinosaurs and don't stop running.

Flee from the crocodiles and do not fall into rocks or logs!

REALISTIC GRAPHICS
You will be immersed in an environment of extremely realistic nature.

Dinosaurs are very comfortable and happy in this environment! Check it out!

GET FAMILIAR WITH THE DINOSAURS
It is an ideal game for all ages! Play with dinosaurs and you will become great friends!

EXCEED YOUR SCORES
Improve the speed of your Dino day after day and train him so that together you become the best of the world!

SOCIAL MEDIA
Follow us on Twitter: @Oscarminigames
Give us a like on Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
